extensionDescriptionCeibal.message: Catalog of books downloaded from the Ceibal Library

textBadge.message: You do not have downloaded titles

alertCacheMessage.message: Downloaded books will be lost if you delete the data and the browser cache.

alertOnlineMessage.message: Downloaded books can only be read when you do not have an internet connection. For an online reading, access your loans online and press the Display button again to continue reading.
